Name: Clear-Tpm
Synopsis: Resets a TPM to its default state.

Name: ConvertTo-TpmOwnerAuth
Synopsis: Creates a TPM owner authorization value from a supplied string.

Name: Get-Tpm
Synopsis: Gets an object that contains information about a TPM.

Name: Get-TpmEndorsementKeyInfo
Synopsis: Gets information about the endorsement key and certificates of the TPM.

Name: Get-TpmSupportedFeature
Synopsis: Verifies whether a TPM supports specified features.

Name: Import-TpmOwnerAuth
Synopsis: Imports a TPM owner authorization value to the registry.

Name: Initialize-Tpm
Synopsis: Performs part of the provisioning process for a TPM.

Name: Set-TpmOwnerAuth
Synopsis: Changes the TPM owner authorization value.
